com.artisans.code.movimento1euro.fragments

Class CauseListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.artisans.code.movimento1euro.fragments.CauseListFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ViewLastCausesFragment, VotingCausesFragment

    public abstract class CauseListFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Fragment abstract class for the cause lists

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CauseListFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
      This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.

    • Method Detail

      • updateAdapterList

        public int updateAdapterList(java.util.ArrayList<Cause> causeList,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> hashmapList)
        Clears the hashmap list and fills it with new values transformed from the causes list
        Parameters:
        causeList - list of causes to transform into hashmap
        hashmapList - list of hashmaps that is updated - each hashmap object on the list corresponds to a cause, the keys of the hashmap correspond to the data fields of the cause
        Returns:

      • causeToHashMap

        protected abstract java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> causeToHashMap(Cause cause)
        Transforms a cause object into HashMap format (for adapter list to receive later)
        Parameters:
        cause - Cause object to be transformed
        Returns:
        Hashmap, the names of the data fields are the keys, mapping each cause data field to its value

      • notifyChanges

        public void notifyChanges()
        Internally updates the adapter with the current state of the list of causes Updating the list itself does nothing until this method is called.

      • onDetach
